input.sentences: there was a resort that accompanies the beach .
the waters are blue and the skies are clear .
lastly | we took a moment to take a picture next to the beach .
output.sentences: The first day of vacation we visited the beach.
The bus boy accompanies us to our beach resort rooms.
A fantastic view could be seen from our room.
The skies and waters were every color of blue you could imagine.
Lastly, at the moment of departure, I had my picture taken.
